problem_summary_simple: Find the lexicographically smallest palindromic rearrangement of a given palindromic string.
problem_summary_technical: Uses a frequency table to count characters in the first half, then greedily constructs the smallest palindrome.
key_insights: The core idea is to use the counts of characters in the first half of the palindrome to build the smallest lexicographical arrangement.
The middle character (if the string length is odd) is placed in the center.
The second half is a mirror of the first half.
